metadata.name: HackTool - SharpLdapWhoami Execution
metadata.comment: Detects SharpLdapWhoami, a whoami alternative that queries the LDAP service on a domain controller

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sharpldapwhoami.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('sharpldapwhoami')) AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('sharpldapwhoami') OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /method:ntlm')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /method:kerb')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /method:nego')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /m:nego')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /m:ntlm')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /m:kerb'))))

output.summary: Detects SharpLdapWhoami, a whoami alternative that queries the LDAP service on a domain controller

metadata.objective: False positive: Programs that use the same command line flags Reference: https://github.com/bugch3ck/SharpLdapWhoami
